snippet: The suit, brought by 19 former students at Yeshiva University High School for Boys, in Manhattan, names Rabbi George Finkelstein, a former principal, and Rabbi Macy Gordon, a former teacher.
abstract: Lawyer for 19 former students at Yeshiva University High School for Boys files a federal lawsuit, claiming that two former rabbis there carried out hundreds of acts of sexual abuse during the 1970s and 1980s, and that the university’s leaders covered it up.
lead_paragraph: The suit, brought by 19 former students at Yeshiva University High School for Boys, in Manhattan, names Rabbi George Finkelstein, a former principal, and Rabbi Macy Gordon, a former teacher.

headline.main: Lawsuit Says 2 Rabbis Abused Boys at Jewish High School
headline.print_headline: Lawsuit Says 2 Rabbis Abused Boys at Jewish High School

keywords.value: Yeshiva University High School for Boys
keywords.name: organizations
